titleStmt.title: By the Queene. The Queenes most excellent Maiestie hauing ordred that a certaine number of souldiers shall bee foorthwith leuyed and pressed to repaire into the lowe Countreyes ...
Proclamations. 1588-10-04
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Soldiers pressed for service in the Low Countries to keep themselves ready.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
